search.query: | mstats avg(_value) as value where `telegraf_index` metric_name=cpu.usage_iowait OR metric_name=cpu.usage_steel OR metric_name=cpu.usage_system OR metric_name=cpu.usage_user host=* by metric_name, cpu span=1s | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(cpu.*) as "cpu.*" by _time, cpu | eval cpu.usage=('cpu.usage_iowait'+'cpu.usage_system'+'cpu.usage_user') | timechart useother=f limit=45 minspan=1m bins=1000 avg(cpu.usage) AS "avg cpu load %" by cpu
